s.text: Instead, he liked to discuss "Hannah Arendt's sex life" and other literary gossip.
(The newsweeklies' bad luck: Clinton's Monday testimony means the mags will be outdated by the time they hit newsstands.)
And don't forget all his dubious fund-raising phone calls--they may still lead to an independent counsel investigation.
And don't forget all his dubious fund-raising phone calls--they may still lead to an independent counsel investigation.
Each auxiliary writer is a specialist: One adds humor, another adds plot structure, a third adds dialogue that will appeal to women or minorities.
